name: Eyes of Fear
description: Eyes of Fear - an elementary 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass quite difficult levels, playing for an alien.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz+ Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 6.1 Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse
